name: Funny Gay Game
description:
This is my first game made in Godot game engine. Linux version is coming soon, but for now it's only HTML5 and Windows (10 and 11). The first version of the game is not ready, this is Indev 1.0. Hope you enjoy what I have so far.

Controls:

A and Left Arrow key is to move left.

D and Right Arrow key is to move right.

W, Space bar and Up Arrow key is to jump.
